com.aestasit.markdown.slidery.converters
Class ConverterFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.aestasit.markdown.slidery.converters.ConverterFactory

public final class ConverterFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Converter factory that relies on *.properties files located on the class path in META-INF/slidery-converters directory.

Method Detail

createConverter

public static Converter createConverter(java.lang.String id)
Lookups <id>.properties under META-INF/slidery-converters directory in the class path and based on converter-class property value creates Converter instance.

Parameters:
id - converter identifier.
Returns:
converter instance.
